name: Flickr
description: Flickr (pronounced flicker) is an image hosting and video hosting website, and web services suite that was created by Ludicorp in 2004 and acquired by Yahoo in 2005. In addition to being a popular website for users to share and embed personal photographs, and effectively an online community, the service is widely used by photo researchers and by bloggers to host images that they embed in blogs and social media.

apis.name: Flickr
apis.description: The Flickr API consists of a set of callable methods, and some API endpoints.  To perform an action using the Flickr API, you need to select a calling convention, send a request to its endpoint specifying a method and some arguments, and will receive a formatted response.
